description.narrative: This activity (UK Aid Direct Grants (UKAD)) is a component of UK Aid Direct Fund - working with small and medium charities reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Not for profit organisation' and a budget of £174,991,585. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Education policy and administrative management, Health policy and administrative management, Democratic participation and civil society, Small and medium-sized enterprises (SME) development, Environmental policy and administrative management. , with the following implementing partners: Bond, MannionDaniels, Triple Line. The start date is 12-01-2012 and the end date is 31-03-2025.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

description.narrative: Education - Social Affairs - Education - administration, policy and planning
Environment - Water, Natural Resource Management and Environment - Environment - policy, planning and administration
Health - Social Affairs - Health - policy, planning and administration
Industry - Economic Affairs - Industry - development and services
Other General Services - General Public Service - Other General Services - support to civil society
Aggregated spend of less than £500 - Financial Year 2016 Quarter 4
